name: AR Pony - Guns Reality Games
description:
Do you love Pony? Play with your pony in reality (real world). You can fun with your pixel pony on your room. Shoot your devil pixel pony today :)

How to play
* Following instruction to place portal
* Shoot all pony that you can see

Features:
* Play with your pony in real world
* One touch controls to shoot pony!
* Shoot Bosses to upgrade new level!
* while play, please be aware thing on real world to save yourself & other

AR Pony requires iPhone 6s or newer.
